p: The phenolic analysis of the dichloromethane, chloroform, ethyl acetate, and ethanol extracts of S. atropurpurea L. stem (identification and quantification) followed the methodology described by Hrichi et al. [ 55] and Haoujar et al. [ 58]. The phenolic compounds were determined using a high performance liquid chromatography system coupled to photodiode array and mass spectrometry detection (LC-PDA- ESI/MS).
